item.title: Galaxy Unpacked on January 22: Samsung opens pre-reservations for S25 series in India - The Financial Express
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked on January 22: Samsung opens pre-reservations for S25 series in India

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Financial Express

Samsung announced today that its next Unpacked event will take place on January 22 in San Jose, California, where the Galaxy S25 series will be revealed.

  • Pre-reservations for the Galaxy S25 series are now live in India.
  • Customers can reserve a unit by paying a refundable amount of Rs 2,000.
  • The pre-reserved customers will receive exclusive launch offers worth up to Rs 5,000.
  • The devices are expected to feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • Samsung will introduce its XR headset, Project Moohan, at the event.
“Pre-reserved customers will be eligible for early access and receive benefits of up to Rs 5,000 on purchasing the new Galaxy S series devices.”

In summary, Samsung is gearing up for an exciting launch with the new Galaxy S series and the introduction of its XR headset.

item.title: CES 2025: Nvidia announces RTX 50 Series GPUs with 2x performance boost and DLSS 4.0 - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: Nvidia announces RTX 50 Series GPUs with 2x performance boost and DLSS 4.0

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Times of India

Nvidia has announced the launch of its RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025, featuring a significant performance increase and the integration of DLSS 4.0 technology.

  • Introduction of RTX 50 Series GPUs with double the performance of previous models.
  • New DLSS 4.0 technology promises enhanced graphics rendering.
  • Improvements aimed at both gamers and professionals in graphic-intensive applications.
  • Expected release date and pricing to be announced later this year.
“This new generation sets a new standard for performance and visual fidelity,” said Nvidia's CEO.

The unveiling of the RTX 50 Series at CES 2025 marks another milestone in Nvidia's commitment to pushing graphics technology forward, appealing to a wide range of users from gamers to creative professionals.

item.title: Samsung Brings ‘Vision AI’ Features For Smart TVs And Home At CES 2025: All Details - News18
item.description:
Samsung Introduces Vision AI for Smart TVs at CES 2025

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: News18

Samsung is showcasing its latest AI advancements at CES 2025, introducing a range of features for its Smart TVs termed ‘Vision AI’.

  • New AI features include real-time content translation and personalized content recommendations through partnerships with Microsoft and Google.
  • Generative Wallpaper allows for personalized artwork display.
  • The company is also enhancing its Home AI ecosystem aimed at a hyper-personalized smart home experience.
  • Other offerings include a flagship Neo QLED 8K TV model boasting advanced AI capabilities.
"The company is bringing AI to homes as well with the Home AI ecosystem that looks to unify the UI experience and features across different products available in the segment."

This launch marks a significant step in integrating AI into home entertainment and technology ecosystems.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates: Next-gen OnePlus smartphones arrive tonight - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates

Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is set to unveil its latest smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, during its 2025 Winter Launch event today. The launch will also include a variant of the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 and is speculated to introduce the OnePlus Watch 3.

  • Launch event scheduled for 9PM IST.
  • The OnePlus 13 and 13R are the highly-anticipated next-gen smartphones.
  • Live updates and impressions will be provided during the event.

item.title: Nvidia launches RTX 50 series GPUs at CES 2025: See prices, specs, AI features, other details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nvidia Unveils RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Nvidia has launched its new RTX 50-series graphics cards at CES 2025, promising significant upgrades in performance and efficiency for PC gamers.

Key Points:

  • The RTX 50-series GPUs feature performance enhancements, efficiency improvements, and a sleek redesign.
  • The top-tier RTX 5090 boasts twice the performance of the RTX 4090, suitable for smaller PC cases.
  • Specs of RTX 5090: 32GB GDDR7 memory, 21,760 CUDA cores, 1,792GB/sec bandwidth.
  • Mid-range models RTX 5070 Ti and RTX 5070 offer double the performance of their predecessors.
  • Nvidia's new GPUs support advanced AI features like DLSS 4 and Neural Shaders.
  • Prices range from $549 for the RTX 5070 to $1,999 for the RTX 5090.

Notable Quotes:

“These GPUs are likely to become highly sought after, especially for PC gamers.”

The RTX 50-series GPUs for laptops will launch in March 2025.

Conclusion:

The RTX 50-series represents Nvidia's continued commitment to leading the graphics technology market, emphasizing performance, efficiency, and innovative AI features.

item.title: Samsung sets date for Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Samsung Announces Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event Date

Published: 07 January 2025, 08:37 IST

Samsung has officially set the date for its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, which will take place on January 22, 2025, in San Jose at 10:00 am PT. The event will be live streamed on Samsung's official channels.

Samsung is expected to announce the successor to the Galaxy S24 series, including a new model named Galaxy S25 Slim. This model will feature a thinner design and improved specifications, including a 200MP camera and a robust Snapdragon processor. In total, there will be four variants of the Galaxy S25 series.

  • Galaxy Unpacked 2025 is scheduled for January 22, 2025, at 10:00 am PT.
  • Live streaming will be available on Samsung's official websites and YouTube channel.
  • The new Galaxy S25 series will include four variants: S24, S25 Plus, S25 Slim, and S25 Ultra.
  • Notable features include a high-resolution display, advanced camera systems, and enhanced AI capabilities.
"The Galaxy S25 Slim is the first of its kind in the Galaxy S series, featuring a 6.66-inch screen and a powerful Snapdragon chipset."

This event is highly anticipated as Samsung prepares to showcase its new innovations in mobile technology.

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung Set To Unveil Galaxy S25 Series With Cutting-Edge AI Features; Check Expected Specs and Pre-Booking Offers - Zee News
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung Set To Unveil Galaxy S25 Series With AI Features

Date: January 22, 2025
Source: Zee News

Samsung is set to launch its Galaxy S25 Series featuring new AI capabilities at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose. The event will be live-streamed on various platforms.

The Galaxy S25 series will include Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra with pre-reserve offers starting from Rs 1,999.

Key Points:

  • Event date: January 22, 2025 at 10 am PT
  • New AI features aimed at enhancing user interaction
  • Pre-reservations in India started at Rs 1,999
  • Expected sale date: February 7, 2025
  • Featuring Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with 12GB RAM
  • Potential for a Galaxy S25 Slim variant later in the year
  • Upgraded cameras and improved charging speeds
“More natural and intuitive Galaxy AI” - Samsung

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Series promises to introduce innovative features that will enhance how users engage with their devices.

item.title: CES 2025: NVIDIA brings AI to PC gaming with GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs - Business Standard
item.description:
NVIDIA Unveils GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025

Date: January 2025 Source: Major News Outlet

NVIDIA announced the GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025, featuring AI-powered technologies for enhanced graphics performance.

  • The GPUs are based on NVIDIA's new Blackwell architecture.
  • RTX 5090 leads the series, boasting 92 billion transistors and significant computing power.
  • New DLSS 4 technology enhances gameplay, outpacing previous models by up to 2x.
  • AI-powered shaders provide film-quality visuals in real-time.
  • NVIDIA ACE technology introduces autonomous game characters.
"Blackwell, the engine of AI, has arrived for PC gamers, developers and creatives." - Jensen Huang, CEO of NVIDIA

The launch of the RTX 50 series marks a major advancement in PC gaming technology, promising unprecedented performance and realism.

item.title: Samsung introduces Vision AI for smart TVs and display technologies- Know what it is and how it will work - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Samsung Unveils Vision AI to Enhance Smart Devices at CES 2025

Publication Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Samsung has launched its new AI technology, Vision AI, at CES 2025, aimed at empowering smart TVs and appliances with advanced AI features.

  • Vision AI will be integrated into Samsung's 2025 smart TV lineup including Neo QLED, OLED, QLED, and The Frame.
  • Personalized features like Click to Search and Live Translate will enhance user interaction with smart displays.
  • Integration with the SmartThings ecosystem for smart home management.
  • Real-time updates for family and pet monitoring, along with environmental alerts.
  • Advanced On-device AI for picture and sound enhancements.
  • Collaboration with Microsoft for content recommendations and 3D audio technology with Google.
“Samsung Vision AI transforms screens into smart companions that enhance entertainment, and simplify interactions.”

This innovative AI approach by Samsung is set to redefine user interactions with screens and smart home devices, making them more intuitive and responsive to user needs.

item.title: Nvidia's CEO revealed new Graphic Cards based on the Blackwell architecture, how one AI project uses Apple Vision Pro during his CES Keynote - Patently Apple
item.description:
Nvidia Unveils New Graphic Cards and AI Initiatives at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 7, 2025, Source: Patently Apple

Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang announced the GeForce RTX 50-series graphic cards and showcased new AI projects, including the use of Apple Vision Pro for robotics, during his CES 2025 keynote.

  • The new graphics cards are based on Blackwell architecture, targeting both consumer and data center markets.
  • Prices for the GeForce RTX 50-series cards range from $550 to $2,000, with laptop models shipping in March.
  • Nvidia aims for its technology to be central to a future with autonomous robots, factories, and vehicles.
  • The Nvidia Isaac GROOT Blueprint utilizes Apple Vision Pro for synthetic motion generation in humanoid robots.
“GeForce allowed AI to reach the masses, and now AI is coming home to GeForce.” - Jensen Huang

In summary, Nvidia's announcements focus on expanding AI capabilities along with enhancing graphics processing power, indicating a significant push towards integrating technology into everyday automation.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates: OnePlus set to unveil much-awaited flagship series - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates

Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is set to unveil its latest smartphone series today, including the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, alongside new audio products.

  • Launch event scheduled for 9 PM IST.
  • Introduction of OnePlus Buds Pro 3 variant.
  • Speculated release of OnePlus Watch 3 with advanced health features.
  • Live updates and first impressions to follow.
We’ll be bringing you live updates as OnePlus takes the wraps off these highly-anticipated devices.

This launch marks an important development in OnePlus's offerings, aiming to attract a broader audience in the premium smartphone segment.

item.title: Samsung Electronics Unveils Samsung Vision AI and New Innovations at First Look 2025, Transforming Screens Into AI-Powered Companions and Elevating Everyday Life - Samsung Newsroom Malaysia
item.description:
Samsung Launches Vision AI for Enhanced Smart Living at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Samsung News

Samsung Electronics showcased Samsung Vision AI at CES 2025, introducing AI-driven screens designed to enrich daily life and enhance user interactions.

  • Vision AI integrates personalized features to transform screens into adaptable companions.
  • New flagship Neo QLED 8K QN990F launched with cutting-edge AI features.
  • Expanded Samsung Art Store and The Frame line for a premium art experience at home.
  • Partnership with Microsoft enhances Smart TVs with Microsoft Copilot for improved user interaction.
  • Innovative new projectors and mirror displays redefine home technology applications.
“Samsung sees TVs not as one-directional devices for passive consumption but as interactive, intelligent partners that adapt to your needs,” - SW Yong, President and Head of Visual Display Business.

Samsung's innovations at CES 2025 illustrate its commitment to leading the future of display technology.

item.title: Nvidia is bringing a native GeForce Now app to Steam Deck - The Verge
item.description:
Nvidia Introduces Native GeForce Now App for Steam Deck

Publication Date: Later this year

Source: Nvidia Blog

Nvidia is set to launch a native GeForce Now app for the Steam Deck, making cloud gaming more accessible and efficient for users.

The new app aims to simplify the installation process and enable higher performance gaming.

  • Nvidia will release a GeForce Now app for Steam Deck later this year.
  • The app will support up to 4K resolution and 60 fps with HDR when connected to a TV.
  • The current setup requires a special script, making the native app a more user-friendly option.
  • GeForce Now will also be available on major VR headsets including Apple Vision Pro and Meta Quest 3.
  • Upcoming Microsoft titles like Avowed and DOOM: The Dark Ages will be accessible via GeForce Now.
“Nvidia plans to bring GeForce Now to some major VR headsets later this month.”

This new native application and the expansion to VR headsets reflect Nvidia's commitment to enhancing user experiences in cloud gaming.

item.title: The ROG Strix Scar 16 and 18 come with a lid that lights up and more RGB - The Verge
item.description:
Asus ROG Strix Scar 16 and 18 Unveiled with Exciting RGB Features

Publication Date: December 23, 2024

Source: The Verge

Asus has launched its latest ROG Strix Scar gaming laptops, which embrace a vibrant gamer aesthetic with customizable RGB lighting and a unique lid display.

  • The Scar 16 and 18 feature a programmable LED dot-matrix display on the lid.
  • Specifications include an Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX processor and Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU.
  • Up to 64GB of RAM and a 2TB PCIe Gen4 SSD are available for configuration.
  • The ROG Nebula HDR display includes a 2.5K Mini LED panel with 1,200 nits brightness and a 240Hz refresh rate.
  • Asus claims low fan noise levels, thanks to advanced cooling technology.
“Asus claims it can keep fan noise levels to a library-like 45dB.”

The ROG Strix Scar starts at $2,599 and will begin shipping in February 2025.

item.title: Alienware Goes Big at CES 2025: Announces New Desktops, Laptops And Monitors - Times Now
item.description:
Alienware Goes Big at CES 2025: Announces New Desktops, Laptops And Monitors

Date: January 2025

Source: Tech News Network

Alienware, Dell's gaming powerhouse, has unveiled a range of new hardware at CES 2025, including Area-51 desktops and laptops, a 27-inch QD-OLED gaming monitor, and a customer support initiative named Alienware Elite Care.

  • Revival of the iconic Alienware Area-51 desktops and laptops.
  • The new desktops support high-performance components, including next-gen NVIDIA graphics.
  • Introduction of a 27-inch 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor.
  • Launch of Alienware Elite Care for enhanced customer support.
“With this launch, Alienware appears to be solidifying its commitment to delivering high-performance gaming solutions.”

This announcement by Alienware highlights its aim to cater to gamers' needs with powerful products and dedicated support, setting an ambitious tone for the year ahead.

item.title: OnePlus 13 series India launch: Date, timings, and how to watch live stream - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13 series India launch: Date, timings, and how to watch live stream

Publication Date: Today
Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is set to launch multiple new products during its winter event, which will be live-streamed on YouTube starting at 9:00 PM IST today.

  • The OnePlus 13 and 13R smartphones are among the key products being released.
  • The flagship OnePlus 13 is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, featuring innovative camera technology and a quad-curved display.
  • The OnePlus 13R is expected to be a more affordable option with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip.
  • Both models will feature large batteries with fast charging capabilities.
  • Pricing is expected to be between Rs 65,000 - Rs 70,000 for the OnePlus 13 and under Rs 50,000 for the OnePlus 13R.
“The OnePlus 13 will come with a quad-curved display, offering 2K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.”

This launch event marks an exciting time for OnePlus fans in India, as the new models promise significant upgrades and enhanced features.

item.title: Dell resurrects Area-51 for the third time with Alienware 16 Area-51 and Alienware 18 Area-51 featuring Arrow Lake-HX and GeForce RTX 50 graphics sans DGFF - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Dell Revives Area-51 with New Alienware Gaming Laptops

Date: 2025-01-07 Source: Notebookcheck

Dell is once again introducing the Area-51 branding with the new Alienware 16 and 18 Area-51 laptops, powered by Intel's Arrow Lake-HX CPUs and Nvidia's RTX 50 GPUs.

  • The Alienware 16 and 18 Area-51 are redesigned versions of the previous m16 and m18 models.
  • These laptops feature a zero-hinge design with a visible cooling area and enhanced thermal systems.
  • They are powered by Intel's Core Ultra 7 and 9 options and feature Nvidia's latest GPUs.
  • Displays are QHD+ (2560x1600) at 300 Hz, with a starting price of $1,999.
  • Availability is set for later in Q1 2025.
"The Alienware 16 Area-51 and Alienware 18 Area-51 will be available later in Q1 in select configuration for a launch price of $3,199, with the entry-level configuration starting from $1,999."

In conclusion, the return of the Area-51 line marks a significant step forward for Dell in the gaming laptop market, emphasizing innovation in design and performance.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 to Take Place on January 22; New Galaxy S Series Launch Teased - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Confirmed to Be Held on January 22

Date: January 22, 2025 | Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung has announced that the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event will take place in San Jose, California, featuring the expected launch of the Galaxy S25 series.

  • The launch event is scheduled for January 22, 2025, at 10 am PT.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is expected to deliver significant advancements in mobile AI experiences.
  • Pre-reservations for the Galaxy S25 series are available in India, offering exclusive benefits to early customers.
  • Three models of the Galaxy S25 are anticipated: Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra.
  • New features may include improved battery life and design changes for the Ultra model.
  • Potential announcements for additional products like the Project Moohan XR headset and Galaxy Ring 2 are also expected.
“The annual event will witness the launch of the new generation Galaxy S series.”

In conclusion, the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked 2025 is set to be a key moment for Samsung, highlighting its latest innovations in mobile technology and AI.

item.title: Nvidia CEO unveils more powerful graphics cards at CES event - BusinessLine
item.description:
Nvidia CEO Unveils Powerful New Graphics Cards at CES 2025

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: The Hindu Business Line

Nvidia's new GeForce graphics cards, revealed by CEO Jensen Huang at CES 2025, are designed to leverage AI for enhanced gaming experiences, marking a shift towards more realistic graphics.

  • Nvidia announced new GeForce 50 series graphics cards utilizing Blackwell design.
  • The flagship RTX 5090 will retail for $1,999 and be available later this month.
  • The RTX 5070, priced at $549, will launch in February 2025.
  • These new GPUs promise to enhance battery life for laptops and blend responsive gameplay with realism.
  • Nvidia's gaming division remains a significant revenue source, generating approximately $10 billion annually.
“GeForce allowed AI to reach the masses, and now AI is coming home to GeForce.” - Jensen Huang

The unveiling of Nvidia's new graphics cards highlights the company's commitment to integrating AI into gaming technology, promising advancements that could redefine user experiences in the gaming industry.

item.title: Sony and Honda's new Afeela electric car to start at $89,900, but only for buyers in California - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sony and Honda Launch Afeela Electric Car Starting at $89,900, Initially for California Buyers

Date: Jan 07, 2025 08:30 AM IST Source: Hindustan Times

Sony and Honda have teamed up to introduce the 'Afeela,' an electric vehicle (EV) available for pre-orders at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. Initially, the car will be sold only in California.

  • The Afeela comes in two trims: Afeela 1 Origin at $89,900 and Afeela 1 Signature at $102,900.
  • Includes a three-year subscription to in-car features like Level 2+ driver assist and AI-powered personal assistant.
  • Offers up to 300 miles of EPA-estimated range and supports Tesla's Supercharger network.
  • Initial delivery for Signature trim starts in 2026, while Origin will follow in 2027.
  • Features advanced technology including 40 sensors, cameras, and potential augmented reality integration.
“Come on out, Afeela” - Yasuhide Mizuno, CEO of Sony Honda Mobility.

The Afeela represents a significant step in Sony and Honda's collaboration, reflecting the rising demand for EVs. Details on shopping for the vehicle will be announced soon.

item.title: Apple working to update AI feature after BBC complaint - BBC.com
item.description:
Apple to Update AI Feature Following BBC Complaints

Date: Recent
Source: BBC News

Apple is responding to concerns over its new AI feature that has produced inaccurate news alerts, stating it will implement a software update to clarify notifications generated by its AI system.

The company's flaws were highlighted after erroneous summaries of BBC notifications, including false claims about high-profile news events.

  • Apple acknowledges issues with its AI news summarizations.
  • BBC complained about inaccuracies in notifications related to crucial news events.
  • Apple plans to roll out updates to improve notification clarity in the coming weeks.
  • Errors include misinformation about the PDC World Darts Championship and false claims about Rafael Nadal.
“It is critical that Apple urgently addresses these issues as the accuracy of our news is essential in maintaining trust.” - BBC Spokesperson

In response, Apple has promised improvements and supports user feedback for better performance of its AI notifications.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Launch In India Today: Price, Specs, How To Watch LIVE - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Launch In India Today: Price, Specs, How To Watch LIVE

Publication Date: Today

Source: TNN

The OnePlus 13 series is set to launch today in India at 9:00 PM IST, featuring the flagship OnePlus 13 and the more affordable OnePlus 13R.

  • The launch event will also include the introduction of the OnePlus Buds Pro 3.
  • The OnePlus 13 boasts a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a 6,000mAh battery.
  • The device features a triple rear camera system with three 50MP sensors.
  • The OnePlus 13R, powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, includes a 50MP telephoto lens.
  • Expected pricing: OnePlus 13R around Rs 50,000 and OnePlus 13 under Rs 70,000.
Rumours suggest that the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 could be priced at Rs 13,999 in India.

The launch event promises to redefine smartphone expectations, showcasing advanced features and performance enhancements.

item.title: It’s your touch that will push an AI co-worker to do better | Mint - Mint
item.description:
AI Co-Workers: Enhancing Productivity and Collaboration

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

As AI technology advances, artificial intelligence is becoming a vital part of the workplace, redefining the nature of co-working through collaboration rather than replacement.

  • AI co-workers are seen as intelligent entities that improve productivity by automating repetitive tasks.
  • Rather than replacing human roles, AI collaborates with workers, enhancing teamwork.
  • These AI tools are rapidly integrating into various industries, reshaping operations and problem-solving processes.
"AI co-workers are not just tools; they are intelligent entities that enhance productivity and streamline operations."

In conclusion, AI co-workers represent an evolution in workplace dynamics, aiding human colleagues rather than supplanting them, thereby paving the way for more innovation and efficiency in various sectors.

item.title: Samsung Brings ‘Vision AI’ Features For Smart TVs At CES 2025: All Details - News18
item.description:
Samsung Unveils ‘Vision AI’ Features for Smart TVs at CES 2025

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: News18

Samsung is revolutionizing their premium TV lineup by introducing a range of AI features dubbed ‘Vision AI’ at CES 2025.

  • Samsung is launching AI features for Smart TVs, termed ‘Vision AI’.
  • Notable features include Click to Search, Live Translate, and Generative Wallpaper.
  • New collaborations with Microsoft and Google enhance the capabilities of Samsung’s AI features.
  • The flagship models include advanced AI processing capabilities with enhancements like 8K AI Upscaling Pro.
  • Samsung’s Vision AI provides real-time subtitle translations for live content.
“Samsung claimed that they would work with Google to expand what Vision AI can do.”

In conclusion, Samsung’s focus on AI at CES 2025 marks a significant step forward in enhancing user experience through innovative applications.
